    • Component

      public Component(int id, String path, int height, int weight, int depth, int startingX, int startingY, boolean canCollide, boolean isVisible)
      Create a component
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      path - the path of his sprite
      height - his height
      weight - his weight
      depth - the depth he is on the game
      startingX - abscissa
      startingY - ordinate
      canCollide - set the collidabilty
      isVisible - set the visibility
